name: Project Fighter Z
description:
Project Fighter Z is a Super Smash Bros and Jump Force inspired fan game featuring 4-player remote support and 4 extra slots for bots equaling an 8 player brawl.

Full credit goes to the authors for the sprites used in the game!

Characters From Dragon Ball, Berserk, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Fist of The NorthStar and many more!!!

Unlockable Characters

Journey Mode

8-Player Battle Mode

Endless Survival Mode

Online Mode possible with Parsec

Bot Support with Difficulty Settings

Combo moves and special moves

Assist Items

If you enjoy the game be sure to donate to help support further development on more projects and content: https://streamlabs.com/lerrycapetime/tip
